item.title: Introducing Kadabra - My New, Used x230
item.description: As I start to do more with a computer on the go, the netbooks I previously used just are not cutting it anymore. They were great for minimal use, but couldn’t run VMs, over-heated, and didn’t have great battery life. Now that I am going to libraries and other locations to work on personal and open source projects, I really needed a better mobile pc setup. Other Considerations I had been keeping an eye open for a new mobile computer for well over a year to find out what is out there.
